did.abstract: One letter from Arthur P. Hayne to Robert J. scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: One letter from Arthur P. Hayne to Robert J. Walker contains some information on the presidential campaign of 1844; one from Mitchell King, gives the qualifications of a good English grammar; the third, from Hayne to Thomas Aspinwall, U.S. consul in London, 1838, concerns the prospects for fire insurance companies in Charleston.
